Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip, now much darkened, and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, TA:30-31 House T36.44 I.22
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393609) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393609)
